code:
json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "baseUrl": "./",
    "outDir": "build",
    "sourceMap": true,
    "noImplicitAny": true,
    "module": "commonjs",
    "target": "es6",
    "allowJs": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "strict": true,
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "paths": {
      "@/*": ["./src/*"]
    }
  },
  "include": ["src/**/*"],
  "exclude": ["node_modules/", ".vscode/", "**/*.test.ts", "**/*.spec.ts"]
}
